subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Striker Diego Forlán scored twice as Uruguay knocked host Venezuela out of the Copa América with a 4-1 victory in a quarterfinal in San Cristobal. Uruguay advanced to a semifinal game against Brazil, which routed Chile, 6-1, in Puerto La Cruz.
